name: Lidenbrock
description:
Lidenbrock is a game where you get into the role of a deep shaft miner. During your shift, a dangerous gas leakage happens and many of your coworkers die on the spot. You are the lucky one - for now - as the gas is lighter than air and you know, that as long as you manage to dig down, you will survive.

The name Lidenbrock comes as a reference to one of the most classical books written by Jules Verne, named "Journey to the Center of the Earth", where a bunch of people lead by a preffesor Otto Lidenbrock lead an expedition into the crater of an icelanding vulcano named "Snæfellsjökull" and discover a brand new world below Earth's crust.

On this game worked:

-Glow - Our programmer, resident maniac and head of this project. Works perfectly to the moment when things go down south, then it is pain in the ass to work with him

-Fjana - Our graphical designer who also came up with the game idea and mechanics, (also wrote this describtion, hello dear world!), did many miscellaneous tasks in the process

-Gar - Our sound engineer, our resident American thanks to which we have to switch between our native language and english constantly because he joins our voice chat on random occasions

  • Aseprite v1.2.25

Some things you might find interesting:

- There are some easter eggs in the game, hope you find at least some

- We have more cringy & stupid jokes on our profile describtion

- After a score of 15,930,000, your player would technically surpass the center of the planet and at a score of around 31,860,000, you would have surpassed the diameter of the Earth

- The name of the game was just a decision out of "I don't care, just make it happen"

- Glow's highscores are 1320 on easy, 1044 on medium and 835 on hard. Try to beat that!
